thread.title: Amazing bar staff
thread.title_full: Amazing bar staff - Review of Aloft London Excel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lsme1886
title: Amazing bar staff
text: Popped in for some cocktails and ended staying later just superb bar staff in the wxyz bar ! I was supposed to be staying at this hotel and at last moment the booking agents moved me to the Hilton next door. Big thanks to Carlitos , Laury and Khafe ? Who made the most divine cocktails esp the Brazilian bikini Tini !!! Had some food too it was good too. Next time I will def stay and book direct . Aloft these guys are a credit to you !! See you soon (visited 11th march) well done xx
